text.0: Prof Clare @GreyGroupCam and Dr David Hall @ChemCambridge @FaradayInst share their views on the next 10 years for lithium ion batteries and beyond! Thank you for contributing to the @NatureComms anniversary project #battchat #zerocarbon future https://t.co/eqjmOmwbU4
